body.name: LILLUSORY Women‘s Linen Wide Leg Pants 2024 Casual Loose Lightweigt Beach Palazzo Harem Pants
features: The perfect summer, vacation, lounge, going out, staying in, casual, dress up or down pants! Thess harem-inspired pantslooks good on every body type, with every outfit, and are even comfy enough to nap in

Crafted from soft breezy linen blend fabric, this pant is as comfortable as it is classic. It is designed in a wide-leg silhouette and features elastic waistband, drawstring detail and dropped side pockets for added volume.
Pair it with your favorite tee or effortlessly thrown over your swimsuit, these pants have endless ways to wear

MACHINE WASH, HANG DRY: To maintain your apparel's vibrant color we recommend machine washing with laundry bag on cold and hanging to dry. Use a low iron or steamer to restore that perfect flowy look.
Size: Please Refer To Size Chart For Details Before Purchase Which We Provide In Our Pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic Comfort and Style
reviews.reviewText: I stumbled upon these Flowy Linen Pants in Brown, and they have quickly become my new favorite go-to for chic comfort and effortless style.Let’s start with the fabric. The linen material is simply divine - breathable, soft, and luxurious. It drapes beautifully, creating an elegant flowy silhouette that’s both comfortable and flattering. The lightweight nature of the fabric makes these pants ideal for various occasions, from casual outings to beachside strolls or even dressing up for a relaxed evening affair.The brown color is an absolute standout. It’s a rich and versatile shade that pairs well with various tops and accessories. Whether I’m going for a bohemian vibe or aiming for a more sophisticated look, these pants effortlessly complement my style, adding a touch of warmth and elegance to my outfits.The fit and design are equally praiseworthy. The elastic waistband ensures a comfortable and adjustable fit, while the flowy wide legs add a sense of movement and grace. The design strikes the perfect balance between casual comfort and understated sophistication, making these pants versatile for a range of settings and occasions.Moreover, the quality of craftsmanship is evident. The stitching is well-done, and the pants have held up beautifully through multiple washes without losing their shape or color. The durability of these pants is impressive, considering the lightweight fabric.Additionally, the versatility of these linen pants is a significant plus. They can easily transition from daytime casual wear to a more elevated look with the right accessories, making them a staple in my wardrobe for any season.In conclusion, these Flowy Linen Pants in Brown are an absolute wardrobe essential. Their comfortable fit, elegant drape, rich color, and versatile style make them a must-have for anyone seeking comfort, style, and sophistication in a single garment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pants exceeded any & all expectations that I had. I’m OBSESSED! I ordered the ‘lake blue’ color & it’s so pretty. The fit is perfectly oversized & you can make them as high-waisted as you want (the crotch is low so you can pull up/down to suit your taste). I’m 5’3 & these hit my ankle perfectly. These are such a fun spin on cargo-style pants, perfect for summer or fall! I will absolutely be ordering more colors.Edit: I washed them in the washing bc machine & hung them to dry- they shrunk in length a little bit. It’s not an issue for me at all since I’m short (5’3 & they hit my ankle now) but if you’re taller, hand wash only! I love these pants SOOOO much! I’m currently placing my second order for more colors. I can’t get over how luxurious they feel & how cute they are. Buy them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for going out or lounging
reviews.reviewText: These pants are super comfortable and lightweight. I love that I can wear them as I'm hanging out around the house, but also can dress them up. They did shrink in length a little bit, hence docking 1 star but they aren't short enough that I can no longer wear them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars so cute but not quality
reviews.reviewText: first i love the look, and the feel of the fabric. i love that it combines some lightness of rayon with natural feel of linen. looks just l like pic, not fake pictures. cute boho look. problem is 1. how much they shrunk. a good 6 inches of length just from cool wash and low heat drying, and in all other places too. at first they reached my ankle bone, after washing they are halfway up my shins (i'm 5'6). still cute but a lil goofier. whatever. i still love the flowy natural look. 2. they RIPPED on first wash. the seam down front of leg. i made sure not to wash with anything hard like zipper, button, etc because i know rayon is so delicate when wet. so why did they rip? quality i guess. 3. the inside satin feel lining is WEIRD haha. i cut it out because i don't want that extra layer of restriction around my booty. i wanted these for the loose flowy feel to wear during yoga practice and in nature so the lining just was not compatible. it's easy enough to cut out though. bottom line, still cute, but wash very carefully and make sure to size up! I am 135lb, 5'6, big booty, got size M but will size up to at least a L if there's a next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breezy comfy pants
reviews.reviewText: These pants are perfect for a warm day. They pair well casually or business casual. This color is not see through as there is a lining from waist to knee.For reference, I purchased a large in Light Apricot. The color appears more light beige than apricot. I'm 5 foot 1 and 160 pounds. To get the length at my ankle I have the waistband below my belly button. If I wear them on my waist they are a cropped length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good until you wash them
reviews.reviewText: I was obsessed with these pants, I wore them for about three days straight! They are so cute!!! Unfortunately, they shrunk significantly after one wash, probably about 3” in length. They now look ridiculous. The fabric looks completely worn as well, like they’re years old. Unfortunately I am returning these. POOR quality save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite pants!!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted some lightweight comfy pants that would be good for spring, summer, and fall but ones that also looked put together. I took a chance and bought these in white (hoping they weren’t sheer) and they did not disappoint!!! They have a shorts length liner in them that goes right down to where the pockets end and the liner really isn’t visible from the outside, like you’d REALLY have to be looking for something to notice. To test the sheerness and be ABSOLUTELY sure when they came in I tried them on with a pair of neon hot pink lace hipster underwear. I was squatting, bending, doing all the tests and asking a third party if they could be seen so I can with 100% confidence report back that you are safe in them! Obviously I wouldn’t try to wear neon underwear out in them but this proves that it would be safe to wear pretty much any color undies with them if you get behind on laundry and it’s necessary.Also to note, I’m 5’4 195 lbs. these come just below my ankles so if you’re any taller keep that in mind! I personally love the length because things are usually way too long on me but it’s worth noting. Pants are nice and soft, pockets are huge. They’re so comfy I will definitely be buying more colors!

These are really comfy pants and thick, but breathable and light fabric, however after I've worn them for a few hours they get really stretched out, especially around the knees and look a bit out of shape.

These came quickly, the colour is great and the material is nice (though wrinkled!).They're SO comfy but I don't love how they fit myself (I tend to be more tummy heavy). As a note, I think they're probably on the shorter side. I'm 5'2 and they are just skimming the floor.
